means: 市场上买的礼物，酬谢礼品

word_mean: 飞机上罩于外突物或结构外形不连续处以减少空气阻力的流线型构件。

sentence.Network_en: A fairing fitted over the hub of the propeller in some aircraft.
sentence.Network_cn: 螺桨毂盖,机头整流罩某些飞机上装于螺旋桨叶毂上的整流罩.

sentence.Network_en: For example : Left wing - to - body fairing seal is inconsistent in relation to fuselage.
sentence.Network_cn: 左大翼 - 机身整流罩封严胶不均匀.

sentence.Network_en: In fact, China has mature experience in fairing design.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 中国有成熟的整流罩设计经验.
